overview: "Bells of Waiting" - a horror short by Glenn McClanan - tells the eerie tale of Vanessa, a young professional who goes to her ex-boyfriend's apartment to pick up her last possessions, only to discover a chilling secret that changes her life forever.
tagline: A young businesswoman returns to her ex-boyfriend's apartment to find that his obsession with her has taken a supernatural turn
title: Bells of Waiting
